OCR Swift Scanner & AI Art

Brief: OCR Swift Scanner & AI Art is a versatile and user-friendly mobile application that not only empowers you to swiftly scan and decode a myriad of QR code and barcode formats but also offers innovative artificial intelligence features to craft aesthetically pleasing, personalized QR codes. This app is ideal for both personal and professional use, streamlining data access and sharing with a touch of creativity.
